startTime.description: The date and time when the reading was started on the device.

averageHeartRate.description: The average heart rate of the user during the reading.

resultClassification.description: The classification of the ECG result.

waveformSamples.description: An array of integers representing the ECG waveform.

samplingFrequencyHz.description: The frequency in hertz at which the Fitbit ECG app sampled the voltage.

scalingFactor.description: The scaling factor used to convert waveform samples to ECG voltages in mV (mV = waveformSamples / scalingFactor).

numberOfWaveformSamples.description: The total number of samples in the reading.

leadNumber.description: The ECG lead being used to take the reading.

featureVersion.description: The version of the ECG app running on the device.

deviceName.description: Hardware name of the compatible wrist-worn device used to take the reading.

firmwareVersion.description: Firmware running on the compatible wrist-worn device used to take the reading.
